name: Northern Highland
summary: This tour covers the significant highlights of the northern highland. Visit the most picturesque rice terrace fields and meet the most interesting and friendly local people in their home villages. Do some trekking to the top roof of Indochina - Fansipan Peak.

name: Urban Adventure
summary: Got a spare time in Ho Chi Minh City up your sleeve? Fill it with this half-day that covers the classic sights and hidden alleys of the city. Museums, monuments, and the everyday mayhem of the busy city streets all converge on this unforgettable tour.

name: Rustic Roads
summary: Enjoy a wealth of activities that would be almost impossible to arrange independently on this action-packed door-to-door tour. Visit Cai Be Floating Market; tour a craft village; watch live music; sample orchard-fresh fruit; cook your own lunch; and kayak and bike through the Mekong delta.
